content: knit a warm modern cable scarf with super bulky yarn and an easy 8-row repeat clear step-by-step instructions tidy garter edges and a simple c4b cross make this a fast satisfying knit perfect for gifts or your own winter wardrobe this pattern is a free printable yarn 4 skeins lion brand wool-ease thick & quick super bulky 06 sample color fisherman designed for super bulky 06 tools 10 mm us 15 straight needles cable needle 2 stitch markers yarn/darning needle scissors tape measure skill level advanced beginner sizing scarf size / dimensions approx 178 cm / 70″ long × 33 cm / 13″ width medium size
